title: Principles for Managing Alcohol Use Disorder
itunes:title: Principles for Managing Alcohol Use Disorder
description:
This episode discusses the 3 approaches in the treatment of substance use disorders: Medications for alcohol use disorder, counseling, and 12-Step facilitation.

Faculty: Joji Suzuki, M.D.
Hosts: Jessica Diaz, M.D., Flavio Guzman, M.D.

  • Learn more about our memberships here
  • Earn 1 CME: What Clinicians Need to Know About Alcohol Use Disorder
  • Clinical Principles on Managing Alcohol Use Disorder
